ValidationRule.description: Restricts Safe Harbor option based on Service Option + Auto-Enroll Values. ExpressK and CustomK with QACA must use Safe Harbor options containing QACA or NEC.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( ISPICKVAL( Service_Option__c , "Express(k)") || ISPICKVAL( Service_Option__c , "Custom(k)") ) && ISPICKVAL( AutoEnrollment__c , "QACA") && NOT( CONTAINS (TEXT( Safe_Harbor__c ), "NEC")) && NOT( CONTAINS (TEXT( Safe_Harbor__c ), "QACA"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If Auto-Enroll = QACA, Safe Harbor value must contain QACA or Non-Elective
